body_html: One thing that worked for me was that rather than using 'export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64" ' I used 'export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:~/cuda/lib64" ' and it worked.
